name.en: Seminar on  Modern Political Thoughts of the West
name.ch: 近代西方政治思想專題研究

department.ch: 法律與政府研究所碩士班

goal.en: This course will explore the rise and evolution of modern western political thought from the main issues of western society. In addition to understanding the main idea about public life put forward by individual thinkers, we will also put the problems and solutions faced by thinkers into the specific context of the times to understand the main concern behind their thoughts. This course focuses on the western political thoughts of the Enlightenment in the 17th and 18th centuries after the Renaissance, and also discusses the anti-(new) Enlightenment in the 19th century and the contemporary political thoughts in the 20th century. On the one hand, we should understand the main topics of the national political blueprint in the modern West, and at the same time, we should show the characteristics of contemporary western society from the evolution of political thought in various times. Through the evolution of the main ideological issues and the context of the times, we can grasp the basic features of modern western political thought and the clues affecting the development of human society. It is hoped that through the dialogue with individual thinkers, students can be trained to think independently and critically reflect on the political future and humanistic care of contemporary society.
goal.ch: 本課程將從西方社會主要問題出發，探究近代西方政治思想的崛起與演變。除理解個別思想家所提出的對良好公眾生活的反思內涵外， 也將把思想家所面對的問題以及解決方案放到具體的時代脈絡中，以理解其思想背後的主要關懷。本課程以文藝復興後十七、十八世紀啟蒙運動的西方政治思想為主軸 ，兼論十九世紀反(新)啟蒙及二十世紀當代的政治思想。一方面理解近代西方對於國家政治藍圖的主要論述議題 ，同時從各時代政治思想演變過程中，顯現當代西方社會的發展特點。通過主要思想議題及時代脈絡的演變，把握近代西方政治思想的基本面貌以及影響人類社會發展的線索。希冀通過與個別思想家的對話過程中培養學生獨立思考，批判反省當代社會政治能力與人文關懷的素養。

content.en:
Lecture 01 Introduction ---- the eternal problem behind western political thought
Lecture 02 . The rise of rationalism and humanism in the 17th century
Lecture 03 Freedom and equality under the ideas of experience and rationality in
the 18th century
Lecture 04. The romantic world and the evolving world in the 19th century
Lecture 05 Open society and its enemies in the 20th century
Lecture 06 The rudiment of modern political thought -- Machiavelli's On the Sovereign
Lecture 07 Natural Law and Social Contract -- Hobbes' The Great Spirit
Lecture 08 The pioneer of liberalism - Locke's Theory of Government
Lecture 09 National Regime and Power -- Montesquieu's Spirit of Law
Lecture 10 Democracy and equality -- Rousseau's Social Contract Theory
Lecture 11 The State and National Spirit of Kant and Hegel
Lecture 12 Comte's positivist political thought
Lecture 13 Bentham's utilitarian political thought
Lecture 14 Mill's Liberal Political Thought
Lecture 15 Utopian Socialist Political Though
Lecture 16 Nationalism and its challenges
Lecture 17 Characteristics of Contemporary Political
content.ch:
(一) 導論-----西方政治思想背後的永恆問題
(二) 時代脈絡
1. 十七世紀 理性主義與人本主義的崛起
2. 十八世紀 經驗與理性下的自由與平等
3. 十九世紀 浪漫世界與演化的世界
4. 二十世紀 開放社會及其敵人
(三) 主要思想議題 (暫定/實際會有調整變動)
5 近代政治思想萌芽----馬基維利的《君主論》
6 自然法與社會契約----霍布斯的《巨靈》
7 自由主義先驅—洛克《政府論》
8 國家政體與權力---孟德斯鳩《法的精神》
9 民主與平等---盧梭的《社會契約論》
10 康德與黑格爾的國家與國家精神
11 孔德的實證主義政治思想
12 邊沁的功利主義政治思想
13 密爾的自由主義政治思想
14 烏托邦社會主義政治思想
15 民族主義及其挑戰
16 當代政治思想特色
